item.title: Abandoned house being used as a dump, 6th December
item.description:

item.title: Unlit and overloaded skip to the rear of number 4,6,8 Bevercote Walk, 6th December
item.description:
Unlit and overloaded skip to the rear of number 4,6,8 Bevercote Walk. The skip is located to the rear of Everett Walk/Bevercote Walk. Its location is taking up half of the road width, it could hinder refuse or emergency vehicles. The skip is overloaded - items of weight (concrete blocks) could cause significant injury to persons walking along the pavement or road, or cause damage to vehicles. The skip during the evening/night has no markers, lights or other form of illumination, and is located in very dark unlit location

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Osborne Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
